name: lightbox2-site
author: Lokesh Dhakar
description: Lightbox2 site, which includes demos, usage instructions, and troubleshooting information. Lives at lokeshdhakar.com/projects/lightbox2/.

scripts.build: mkdir -p vendor/lightbox2/css vendor/lightbox2/js vendor/lightbox2/images && cp node_modules/lightbox2/dist/css/lightbox.min.css vendor/lightbox2/css/ && cp node_modules/lightbox2/dist/js/lightbox-plus-jquery.min.js vendor/lightbox2/js/ && cp node_modules/lightbox2/dist/images/* vendor/lightbox2/images/
